title: RealityScan app from Epic Games will create 3D models from real-life objects
content:
Epic Games is probably best known for Fortnite and other games it has published, but the company also makes a lot of money building tools for other companies to create video games. Epic revealed a new smartphone app today, RealityScan, which aims to turn real-life objects into 3D models that can be used in games

The post RealityScan app from Epic Games will create 3D models from real-life objects appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Epic Games partnered with Quixel to create an app for turning real-life objects into 3D models for use in game development or other work.
